snippet.title: Koi Farm trailer
snippet.description:
Koi Farm is a game about playing with koi ponds. Explore an infinite number of procedurally generated koi patterns by crossbreeding your fish, and discover new mutations as you go along.

Koi Farm will be released on February 26.

Get it on steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1518810
Or on itch.io: https://jobtalle.itch.io/koifarm
